short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A password manager extension safely stores & auto-fills logins, lets you sign up & sync across devices w/Chrome sync.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay organized and secure with our Password Manager Extension. It safely stores your login details, auto-fills forms, and syncs across devices. Create strong passwords easily and check their strength. Enjoy a dark mode for comfort.
